Services

We are primarily focused on key talent acquisition, whether that be for interim assignments, a programme of change and re-organisation, or leading the charge on a permanent basis.

We do not body shop. However, as a complimentary service for our retained clients, we will often recommend individuals in our network for ad hoc positions that fall outside of our normal business. For example, to staff up a software team with developers or to find a capable project manager.

We will also utilise our network for consultancy engagements such as capability assessments, to look at features such as organisational readiness, culture, process and people.
